Name: Typhoid Mary
Description: Typhoid Mary, an enemy and former lover of Daredevil with psionic powers, including telekinesis, is also truly gravely mentally ill and not entirely responsible for her actions.
FirstComicDescription: The First Appearance of Typhoid Mary!  Kingpin makes an offer to Typhoid she can't refuse after she bests Kingpin at his own game. Can Typhoid inspire love from any man? Even one with an iron will? And what happens when Matt Murdock meets Mary?
